New Records: Isaiah Joe scored a season-high 31 points on 11-for-16 shooting
Isaiah Joe made 6-for-7 three-pointers before halftime
Isaiah Joe made 8 three-pointers on the night
Key Match Events: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander racked up 39 points in three quarters
Josh Hart had six offensive rebounds
The Thunder drained a blistering 10 3-pointers on 15 first-half attempts
Post-Match Reflections: Thunder coach Mark Daigneault said Isaiah Joe's hot shooting in the first half opened up the game
Isaiah Joe said the team's shots came within the flow of the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Thunder shot 14-for-27 from downtown on the night, an exact match from its game against New York a week earlier
Oklahoma City has not attempted fewer than 27 single-game triples this season
Branden Carlson recorded the first three of his NBA career
Others: The Thunder will play the Washington Wizards tomorrow at 5 p.m. CST
The Thunder will play the third of a four-game road trip
